mapper.insert: insert into vacation( vacation_no, vacation_type, req_emp_no, vacation_reason, start_dt, end_dt, total_days, vacation_status) values ( vacation_no_seq.nextval, #{vacation_type}, #{req_emp_no}, #{vacation_reason}, #{start_dt}, #{end_dt}, (#{end_dt} - #{start_dt} + 1), '승인 대기' )
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM vacation
vacation_status LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

mapper.update: UPDATE vacation SET vacation_status = '승인', appr_emp_no = #{appr_emp_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE vacation_no = #{vacation_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE vacation SET vacation_status = '반려', appr_emp_no = #{appr_emp_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where vacation_no = #{vacation_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT total_days FROM ( SELECT total_days, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY total_days DESC) AS rnk FROM vacation ) WHERE rnk = 1
